querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS ApplicationNo, B.AGRMNT_NO AS AgreementNo, AC.CUST_NAME AS CustName, E.MOU_CUST_NO AS MouCustNo, E.MOU_CUST_ID AS MouCustId, A.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, A.PROD_OFFERING_CODE AS ProdOfferingCode, A.PROD_OFFERING_VERSION AS ProdOfferingVersion, C.TOP_DAYS AS TermOfPayment, H.DESCR AS PaidBy, E.PLAFOND_AMT AS PlafonAmt, A.TENOR AS Tenor, F.DESCR AS InstallmentType, G.DESCR AS InstScheme, C.RETENTION_PRCNT AS Retention, A.APP_ID AS AppId
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.AGRMNT B ON A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID INNER JOIN dbo.APP_FCTR C ON C.APP_ID = A.APP_ID INNER JOIN dbo.MOU_CUST E ON E.MOU_CUST_ID = A.MOU_CUST_ID INNER JOIN MOU_CUST_FCTR D ON D.MOU_CUST_ID = E.MOU_CUST_ID INNER JOIN APP_CUST AS AC ON A.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER F ON D.MR_INST_TYPE_CODE = F.MASTER_CODE AND F.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_TYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER G ON D.MR_INST_SCHM_CODE = G.MASTER_CODE AND G.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_SCHM' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER H ON C.PAID_BY = H.MASTER_CODE AND H.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'PAID_BY'
